▾
Dictionary French-English

hilarant adjective, masculine (hilarante f sl, hilarants m pl, hilarantes f pl)—

hilarious adj

Il me fait rire avec des histoires hilarantes. — He makes me laugh with hilarious stories.
less common:
funny adj
amusing adj
uproarious adj
enchanting adj

Examples:

gaz hilarant m—

laughing gas n
See alternative translations
